price: "Sila ani Rabbiin ala gabbaramaa biraa isiniif barbaadaa odoo Inni aalama hunda irra isin caalchisee jiruu?" jedhe.
arabic: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِيكُمۡ إِلَٰهٗا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla aghayra al-lahi abghīkum ilāhan wahuwa faḍḍalakum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
